mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cosme_youtube_tip(youtubeno, cosmeno, youtubetitle, youtubecontent, rdate, youtube, seqno, visible) VALUES(cosme_youtube_tip_seq.nextval, #{cosmeno}, #{youtubetitle}, #{youtubecontent}, sysdate, #{youtube}, #{seqno}, #{visible})
mapper.select: SELECT youtubeno, COSMENO, youtubetitle, youtubecontent, views, rdate, youtube, seqno, visible FROM cosme_youtube_tip ORDER BY youtubeno ASC
SELECT youtubeno, cosmeno, youtubetitle, youtubecontent, views, rdate, youtube, seqno, visible FROM cosme_youtube_tip WHERE cosmeno=#{cosmeno} ORDER BY youtubeno DESC

SELECT youtubeno, cosmeno, youtubetitle, youtubecontent, views, rdate, youtube, seqno, visible FROM cosme_youtube_tip
WHERE cosmeno=#{cosmeno}
WHERE cosmeno=#{cosmeno} AND (UPPER(youtubetitle) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(youtubecontent) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
